trans-unit.source: Contains information about a single data-binding expression in an ASP.NET server control, which allows rapid-application development (RAD) designers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio, to create data-binding expressions at design time.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关单个数据绑定表达式的 ASP.NET 服务器控件，它允许快速应用程序开发 (RAD) 设计器中的，如 Microsoft Visual Studio，在设计时创建数据绑定表达式中的信息。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Each data-binding expression in a server control is represented at design time by an instance of the DataBinding class.
trans-unit.target: 服务器控件中的每个数据绑定表达式的数据绑定类的实例表示在设计时。

trans-unit.source: Any server control that contains one or more data-binding expressions has a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection> object that contains the DataBinding objects.
trans-unit.target: 所有服务器控件，其中包含一个或多个数据绑定表达式都具有<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection>包含的数据绑定对象的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection>

trans-unit.source: This collection is accessible through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataBindingsAccessor> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此集合是可通过访问<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>类实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataBindingsAccessor>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataBindingsAccessor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: When you create a custom RAD designer, use that implementation to access the collection.
trans-unit.target: 当创建自定义的 RAD 设计器时，使用该实现来对集合的访问。

trans-unit.source: Any DataBinding or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection> objects associated with a server control exist only at design time.
trans-unit.target: 任何数据绑定或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection>仅在设计时存在与服务器控件关联的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection>

trans-unit.source: They do not exist at run time and, therefore, are not accessible during run time.
trans-unit.target: 它们在运行时不存在而，因此，不能在运行时。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The property to bind data to.
trans-unit.target: 要将数据绑定到的属性。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework type of the property to bind data to.
trans-unit.target: 若要将数据绑定到属性的.NET Framework 类型。

trans-unit.source: The data-binding expression to be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 要计算的数据绑定表达式。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is the same instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> class as the current object.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的对象是否是同一个实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref>与当前对象的类。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare against the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要针对当前比较的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data-binding property names match; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果数据绑定属性名称匹配;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data-binding expression to be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要进行求值的数据绑定表达式。

trans-unit.source: The data-binding expression to be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 要计算的数据绑定表达式。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the hash code for an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 检索实例的哈希代码<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBinding"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinding> objects are placed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection> object, accessible only at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinding>对象都将置于<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection>对象，仅在设计时访问。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection></xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinding>

trans-unit.source: The collection is a hash table that represents the bindings on a control.
trans-unit.target: 该集合为表示在控件上的绑定的哈希表。

trans-unit.source: There can only be one binding per property, so the hash code computation matches the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinding.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> implementation and only takes the property name into account.
trans-unit.target: 只能有一个绑定，每个属性，使哈希代码计算匹配<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinding.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性实现并仅考虑到帐户名称。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinding.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位有符号的整数哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the ASP.NET server control property to bind data to.
trans-unit.target: 获取要将数据绑定到的 ASP.NET 服务器控件属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The property to bind data to.
trans-unit.target: 要将数据绑定到的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the .NET Framework type of the data-bound ASP.NET server control property.
trans-unit.target: 获取数据绑定 ASP.NET 服务器控件属性的.NET Framework 类型。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework type of the data-bound property.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定属性的.NET Framework 类型。
